resources.string:
" On vocation night. My friends and I drive to suburb town. It's a midnight and we don't have any pleases or hotel to stay in. Suddenly we see an old hotel that 
 stand in the forest. The hotel look like abandonment hotel, no guest, silence and we see only 3 people in the hotel. We heard some strong sound around the road. 
 Some of my friend so scare of that sound. Because of that strong sound and the darkness of that night. we need a place to stay but we don't want that hotel. 
 Q: You want to stay or go on to find a new one better than that hotel?
 
 
 "
